Content.Name: Cough, Cold and Flu
Content.Title: Cough, Cold and Flu
Content.BodyCopy:
Couch, Cold and Flu
  • Baby Ayr saline nose spray/drops:
    Loosens and thins mucus secretions to aid aspiration and removal of mucus from nose
    and sinues, restores vital moisture and provides soothing relief for clogged nasal
    passages due to colds, allergies, sinusitis, or minor nose bleeds
  • Cepacol Sore Throat Lozenges:
    For temporary relief of occasional sore throat, sore mouth, minor mouth irritation, pain
    associated with canker sores
  • Chloraseptic Sore Throat Spray:
    For the temporary relief of occasional minor irritation, pain, sore mouth and sore throat
  • Day Time Liquid Caps, also in liquid:
    Temporarily relieves common cold/flu symptoms: minor aches, pains, sore throat pain, fever, muscular aches, headache, nasal congestion, cough
    comparable to DayQuil®
  • Flu Survival Kit:
    An inexpensive kit designed to help treat flu and flu-like symptoms as well as protect you from infection or infecting others

    Contents:

    • Acetaminophen (10): Temporarily relieves minor aches and pains due to: headache, backache, the common cold, premenstrual and menstrual cramps, muscular aches, minor pain of arthritis, toothache

    • Cepacol Sore Throat Lozenges (8): For temporary relief of occasional sore throat, sore mouth, minor mouth irritation, pain associated with canker sores

    • Ibuprofen 200mg Tablets (10): Comparable to Advil®, Temporarily relieves minor aches and pains due to: headache, muscular aches, toothache, the common cold, minor pain of arthritis, backache, menstrual cramps, temporarily reduces fever

    • Non-PSE Sinus Decongestant (phenylephrine) tablets (10): Comparable to Sudafed PSE®, temporarily relieves sinus congestion and pressure, temporarily relieves nasal congestion due to the common cold, hay fever or other upper respiratory allergies

    • Cough Drops (10): Temporarily relieves cough due to a cold, occasional minor irritation or sore throat, comparable to Halls®

    • Surgical Masks (3): Helps prevent transmission of your illness to others or can use to minimize risk of getting another person’s infection

    • Tempa-Dot (3): Disposable oral thermometer used to diagnose fever

    • Flu & You (1): A pamphlet put out by the CDC to inform and educate about the flu

  • Mucinex:
    Helps loosen phlegm (mucus) and thin bronchial secretions to rid the bronchial passageways of bothersome mucus and make coughs more productive
  • Mucinex D:
    Helps loosen phlegm (mucus) and thin bronchial secretions to rid the bronchial passageways of bothersome mucus and make coughs more productive. Also temporarily relieves nasal congestion due to common cold, upper respiratory allergies, hay fever, temporarily restores freer breathing through the nose, promotes nasal and/or sinus drainage, temporarily relieves sinus congestion and pressure
  • Mucinex DM:
    Helps loosen phlegm (mucus) and thin bronchial secretions to rid the bronchial passageways of bothersome mucus and make coughs more productive, temporarily relieves cough due to minor throat and bronchial irritation as may occur with the common cold or inhaled irritants, the intensity of coughing, the impulse to cough to help you get to sleep
  • Saline Nasal Spray: For dry nasal membranes
    comparable to Ocean®
  • Pseudoephedrine (Requires presentation of driver’s license):
    Temporarily relieves nasal congestion due to the common cold, hay fever or other upper respiratory allergies, temporarily relieves sinus congestion and pressure, both 12-hour and regular.
    comparable to Sudafed®
  • Sinus Rinse Kit:
    For post nasal drip, nasal dryness from occupational and house dust, fumes, animal dander, grass, pollen, smoke, etc.
  • All-Nite, also in liquid caps:
    Temporarily relieves common cold/flu symptoms: minor aches, pains, sore throat pain, fever, muscular aches, headache, nasal congestion, cough
    comparable to Nyquil®
  • Q-Tussin DM:
    Temporarily relieves cough due to minor throat and bronchial irritation as may occur with a cold, helps loosen phlegm (mucus) and thin bronchial secretions to drain bronchial tubes
    comparable to Robitussin DM®
  • Q-Tussin:
    Helps loosen phlegm (mucus) and thin bronchial secretions to make coughs more productive
    comparable to Robitussion®
  • Nasal Decongestant Spray:
    For the temporary relief of nasal congestion due to the common cold, hay fever or other upper respiratory allergies, shrinks swollen membranes so you can breathe more freely
    comparable to Afrin®
  • Vicks VapoRub®:
    On chest and throat, temporarily relieves cough due to common cold, on muscles and joints, temporarily relieves minor aches and pains
  • Maximum Strength Cold & Allergy:
    Temporarily relieves symptoms due to hay fever (allergic rhinitis) or other upper respiratory allergies: runny nose, sneezing, itchy, watery eyes, nasal congestion, itching of the nose or throat, temporarily relieves symptoms due to common cold, runny nose, sneezing, nasal congestion
    comparable to Maximum Strength Actifed®
  • Cold Relief Daytime:
    Temporarily relieves common cold/flu symptoms, minor aches and pains, headache, sore throat, nasal congestion, cough, sinus congestion and pressure, helps clear nasal passages, promotes nasal and sinus drainage, temporarily reduces fever
    comparable to Tylenol® Cold Multi-Symptom Daytime
